sense.name: More forward in a leaping or skipping manner.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] BOUND (PP[directional]) NP1[theme] BOUND PP[directional]
sense.examples: The horse bounded across the meadow. The child bounded over the puddles. Particles bound their way across the universe. Rabbits bound just for the fun of it.

sense.name: Place limits on; form the boundary of or be contiguous to.
sense.examples: Bushes bound the parking lot. Playtimes bound the school day in enjoyable activities.
